title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad in a dream The Noble Messenger Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace, comes in a dream with a real event because Satan cannot imitate his appearance or behavior. But seeing the Prophet Muhammad may be good for the seer and his people, or bad for those who have lost their religion and become involved in worldly innovations. Whoever sees him in a dream, let him be sure of the truth of the vision, and in this case, he is far from just ordinary dream tubes that are from Satan. We will talk about some visions in which we see our master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. And the interpretations of everything mentioned in the vision by the great interpreter of dreams, the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet Muhammad “may God bless him and grant him peace” in a dream Whoever has a calamity or is going through hardship in life and sees the Messenger “may God bless him and grant him peace” with a good event or a beautiful appearance or something that does not repel, it is relief, blessing, food and treatment. The matter does not depend on the vision except what our Noble Messenger says to the seer, or what he does, or on the appearance of the Messenger or the seer. Whoever sees the Messenger in a dream was good or happy If the dreamer is sick in reality, and sees the Prophet in a dream, or is happy in the vision, this indicates He will be healed, God willing. And if he was happy and the dreamer was not bitter, this indicates the pilgrimage to the House of God for the dreamer. And whoever has a debt or a debt, it will be settled for him and his sadness will be removed. And whoever saw him, “may God bless him and grant him peace,” and there was injustice, oppression and fear in his country. Justice and security will spread. And whoever saw the Messenger in a barren land or saw him in his land hungry and destitute. It indicates goodness and fertility, and blessings will rule the land. The grave of the Messenger or a funeral in a dream or his death. In a hadith about the death of the Prophet, “may God bless him and grant him peace,” or his funeral or his grave, the vision may be related to that, or visiting his grave, or the like. Whoever saw that the Messenger was sick and then recovered and recovered from the disease, he and those around him from his family and in general in the place are fixed after corruption. As for visiting the grave of the Messenger, it is interpreted as obtaining money from a large fortune and livelihood. Read also Interpretation of seeing a prayer rug in a dream Meaning of seeing the state of the Prophet while riding or walking or in his appearance In the movement of the Messenger and seeing him in his movement alone without any event accompanying his movement In the vision. Whoever sees him riding, whether on the back of an animal, a camel, a horse, or otherwise. As the seer is accustomed to in his worldly life, the seer will visit the grave of the Prophet on horseback. And if he sees the Prophet walking on his feet, he visits the grave of the Prophet on his feet without riding and walking, and when he sees him standing upright. It announces the safety of the subject of the seer or the imam in his time or his condition and the condition of his family. In the vision of the Prophet, the call to prayer is made, and if there is ruin and destruction in the place, then that place will be built. And if that place is hungry or barren and the price of their condition improves. Whoever sees the Messenger “may God bless him and grant him peace” and is happy, then he will perform Hajj to the House of God in Mecca, and when he sees him, his face is pale, his body descends. Shabby clothes or the absence of any of his qualities or wonderful limbs. This is an interpretation that there will be innovations and weakness in religion and loss and deviation from the straight path. And whoever sees the Messenger sick and recovers from his illness, it is a reform after corruption. As for

In a vision The Prophet gives the call to prayer, and if there is ruin and destruction in a place, then that place will be rebuilt. And if that place is hungry or cramped and their condition improves. title: Interpretation of dreams about seeing chickpeas for single and married women by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing chickpeas for a single and married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing chickpeas in a dream is one of the dreams that warns its owner of the coming of goodness and joy, as scholars paid great attention to it to clarify the evidence of this vision, which they postponed in connection with the dream of a single person. A woman, a married woman, or other cases whose details must be known, so we will explain the interpretation of a dream about seeing chickpeas for single and married women according to Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about seeing chickpeas for a single woman. The meanings of dreams differ from one person to another, as chickpeas are a beneficial legume that contains many nutrients that provide A person’s health, as the details contained in the dream differ from one person to another, and here is the most important thing mentioned, the interpretation of the dream of seeing chickpeas for a single woman: Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing chickpeas in a dream means sustenance and blessings in life. Ibn Sirin also showed that chickpeas in a dream foretells the dreamer of marriage. Close. Also, seeing chickpeas in an unmarried woman’s dream means a happy occasion. Likewise, if an unmarried woman sees chickpeas in her dream, this means wealth and abundant sustenance for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing black clothes in a dream and its effects. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chickpeas in a dream, male interpreters Dreams that chickpeas in a dream indicate many beneficial connotations for the pioneer. Also, seeing chickpeas in a dream is one of the dreams that indicates success after fatigue and achieving goals after putting in a lot of effort, and here are the most important interpretations for that, Interpretation of a dream about seeing chickpeas in a dream: The majority of dream interpreters confirmed that seeing chickpeas in a dream is a sign of kindness and nourishment. Also, if the chickpeas are yellow, this indicates problems faced by the fortuneteller. Seeing chickpeas in a dream also indicates halal money. Likewise, if you see chickpeas being distributed to people, this is a sign of halal money. While seeing cooked chickpeas in a dream indicates an opportunity For travel. See also: Meanings of the interpretation of seeing a grandfather in a dream. The interpretation of seeing green chickpeas in a dream for a married woman. Seeing chickpeas in a dream is one of the good visions that the majority of dream interpreters agree upon, such as Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of seeing green chickpeas in a dream for a married woman: If the young man He eats cooked chickpeas in his dream, this indicates the work that he will undertake in his next life. Also, seeing chickpeas in a dream is a sign of halal money. Seeing chickpeas in a married woman’s dream also indicates a blessing in the diet of this person and his offspring. The same applies if a married woman sees Green chickpeas, this indicates the blessing of her offspring. But if a married woman sees herself offering green chickpeas to her husband, this is a sign of stability and love that unites the spouses. Also, if a married woman sees white chickpeas in her dream and offers them to her children to eat, this indicates happy occasions. See Also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing seeds in a dream from the most famous scholars of complete interpretation. Interpretation of dreams in which you see yourself eating cooked chickpeas. There are indications

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing brown eyes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing brown eyes in a dream: Seeing a person in a dream whose eyes tend to turn brown indicates the end of his fears and also shows the positive impact on the opinion. Also, seeing a person whose eyes tend to turn brown indicates that he is facing problems and has the ability to see situations in a sharp way. If A man saw in a dream his partner who saw the color of coffee, this indicates the deception he sees from this person and that this person is an enemy. Seeing brown eyes in a dream portends the disappearance of opinion worries and repentance from the sins and disobedience that the dreamer commits in his life. Interpretation of seeing brown eyes in A dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her eyes tend to be brown, this indicates her close marriage to a man with a beautiful face. Likewise, seeing brown eyes in a dream for a single woman indicates that her worries and sorrows that she sees in her life are gone, and God knows best. Also, seeing brown eyes in an unmarried girl’s dream means that her lover will enter a new job and earn money from it. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her eyes are brown, this indicates success and excellence in her studies and in her academic and professional life. Interpretation of seeing brown eyes in a dream for a woman Married Woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that her eyes tend to be dark brown, this indicates her closeness to God Almighty and her imminent pregnancy. Likewise, for a married woman to see in her dream that her eyes are brown, it shows the different things that we do in our lives, and it also shows her repentance to God. Seeing the obstacles that she passes through in her husband’s path and in her own way, then the likeness of the comfort that she will see, looking for sadness, joy, happiness, and pleasure. Interpretation of seeing brown eyes in a dream for a man: If a man sees in his dream that her eyes are brown, this indicates his close marriage to a beautiful, good-looking girl. Also, seeing brown eyes in a married man’s dream indicates the removal of worries and his new job that were mentioned previously. Seeing brown eyes in a dream indicates the death of sadness, anxiety, and anguish if the dreamer suffered from imprisonment in an ugly cell. Interpretation of seeing brown eyes in a dream for a pregnant womanIf the pregnant woman She dreams that her eyes are light brown, which means that she will give birth easily and be blessed with a beautiful baby girl. Also, seeing brown eyes in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her child will rise to the highest positions and take his place as a sultan or prince. Brown eyes in a dream are a symbol of the deception to which her husband is exposed. In fact, he was deceived by a stranger, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an electric cable in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an electric cable in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing an electric cable in a dream may indicate stopping worries and sorrows and turning to God. Also, seeing an electric cable in a dream indicates the obstacles that the dreamer goes through, then they are liberated and disappear when he turns to God, And God knows best. Seeing an electric cable in a dream indicates self-development and the desire to create new things, and you will save a lot of money to learn it, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an electric cable in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is washing the energy source, this means that her fears are gone. And her condition is good. Also, seeing electricity in a dream indicates success and distinction in her academic and professional life and her good and close marriage, and God knows best. Seeing an electric cable in a dream means that something new and different will happen in her life, and it also indicates a lot of profit and a lot of sustenance. Interpretation Seeing electrical cables in dreams for married people: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is pulling an electrical wire, this means that she will achieve her goals and ambitions that she is trying to achieve, and God knows best. Also, seeing an electrical cable and washing it in a dream indicates success and excellence in studies for her children in the future, and Ali Salah will change it, And God knows best. Also, seeing an electric wire in a dream shows the different things that a married woman does in her life, and it also indicates that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of seeing an electric wire in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is washing the electric wire, this means that it will be facilitated. Her affairs and that the birth will be easy. Also, seeing electricity in a dream indicates the loss of the pregnant woman’s worries and the fulfillment of her hopes for the birth of a healthy child free of illness. Interpretation of seeing an electric wire in a dream for a man: If a married man sees in his dream that he is buying an electric wire, this indicates the disappearance of worry and anxiety. And returning to God Almighty. Also, seeing electrical wires in a dream indicates achieving goals and the marriage of a close man to a good and beautiful girl, and God knows best. Also, seeing a power cord thrown away in a married man’s dream indicates his marriage again to his wife and the absolute betrayal that he is committing, and God knows best. I know. Also, seeing an electric cable in a dream for a single man indicates his good condition and joining a new job and will save a lot of halal money. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing an entire galaxy in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with the complete interpretation of seeing a galaxy in a dream and the galaxy crossing one of the stars and celestial planets. Seeing a meadow in a dream indicates abundance and plenty of food. The Milky Way is one of the famous galaxies that many people see in their dreams, which brings a lot of money and a lot of food. It is natural to see a person in a complete dream in a strange and unrealistic dream and leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort for the viewer, but here with our favorite eyes we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing the galaxy in a complete dream from the important interpretation and vision books for singles, married people, pregnant women and men. Interpretation of the projection of the galaxy in a dream in full by Ibn Sirin Someone in a dream reaches the Milky Way, and this indicates the good conditions of the dreamer, and also indicates the death of sadness and sorrow. Likewise, the entire Milky Way in a dream indicates good news, happiness and happiness for the viewer at any time and at any time, and God knows best. Also, seeing the Milky Way in a woman's dream indicates that the differences that arose between her and her husband are gone. Interpretation of seeing the galaxy in a complete dream for a woman in general If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing the Milky Way, this means that it will be a long time before the girl regains her self-confidence. Seeing the Milky Way full in a dream also indicates happiness and also shows the fading of fears and quarrels and her short marriage. Also, seeing a complete galaxy or an exploding galaxy In a dream, it indicates the great success that the girl of the audience will achieve and their great respect for her. Seeing the entire galaxy in a dream indicates the good treatment of the virgin with her relatives, as well as the disappearance of sadness and anxiety and the arrival of happiness. Interpretation of seeing the galaxy in a complete dream for a married woman If a married woman dreams of seeing a galaxy, this indicates the love of the married woman for her husband, as it shows the collapse of the differences that occur between them. Also, seeing a galaxy exploding in a dream completely shows the desire of the married woman to confront problems and sorrows and indicates the death of her husband. Also, seeing the entire galaxy in a dream indicates the fulfillment of the hopes and expectations of the married woman, as well as progress in higher affairs and the superiority of her children. Interpretation of seeing an entire galaxy in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing the Milky Way in her dream, this indicates her good condition and the facilitation of the birth process. Also, seeing an entire galaxy in a dream for a pregnant woman expresses the death of her worries, the approaching date of her birth, the cessation of pain and she will have good offspring. Interpretation of seeing a galaxy in a complete dream for a man If a person dreams in a dream that he saw an entire galaxy exploding in a dream, this indicates the loss of his livelihood And losing a lot of money, and God knows best. Also, seeing the entire galaxy in a dream indicates the happiness in which the dreamer will live and the high status in which he will shine in his life. Also, seeing an entire galaxy in a dream indicates many livelihoods and abundant and good money that the man will obtain in his next life. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, write it in

title: Interpretation of seeing feet in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing feet in a dream for a son Sirin knows through the dream site that bicycles are women’s adornments, and that seeing aprons in a dream generally means saving oneself from one’s shackles and reforming oneself after corruption, or superiority and great status or beauty, and there are many sayings in this regard. For the dreamer, they differ according to their types and social positions, and the interpretation of all cases is up to you. Seeing small legs in a dream. Seeing small feet in a dream by Ibn Sirinho carrying a women’s bicycle in a dream with shiny gold or silver usually indicates the marriage of this woman to a man who loves and respects her very much. Wearing leggingsFor the woman in In a dream, a ruby ​​or a gemstone generally indicates that this woman is very beautiful. When a man sees a bicycle in his dream, this symbolizes that he will fall ill or fall into a certain personal disaster, or a harsh and strong experience or a financial crisis that he will face. Never see Mrs. Arc in her dream, usually Which symbolizes that she has a good reputation among everyone. Seeing small feet symbolizes good deeds and livelihood, or the girl will get married soon. title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a single woman and a married woman - the symbol of seeing a snake in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq is one of the dreams that requires a clear and understandable interpretation. It should be clarified that it also expresses some good things that may happen to the dreamer. Many scholars have opinions on this topic, and this topic will be fully explained to you through today’s article, so follow us. Follow the dream interpretation of seeing a snake and a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a snake in a dream is a sign that something is not good. It can represent Seeing a snake is also an unfaithful man with many sects. Seeing a breathing snake means happy news that the dreamer will have a beautiful life. If a man sees a breathing snake, this is a sign that he will get married or have a child in the next few days. Seeing a snake chasing someone in a dream means that The dreamer will face many conflicts with enemies. Seeing killing a snake in a dream is an expression that the dreamer was able to defeat his enemy. A dream in which a snake is eaten in a dream is a sign that he will get a lot of money. Whoever sees that there is a snake biting him is evidence of... That a person’s enemy will take him and cause him serious harm. Snake eggs in a dream are evidence of how strong this person’s enemy is and that he will harm him. Anyone who sees the process of breaking snake eggs in a dream is an expression that the dreamer will win something that he was afraid of. In the case of talking to a snake in a dream From Ibn Sirin’s point of view, this is evidence that the dreamer will be able to obtain something special through a woman he knows. The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a snake in a dream means that a person has an enemy close to him. He will become his enemy. As for the person who sees a lot of snakes entering and leaving his house in a dream, this indicates that he is suffering from worries and troubles, and seeing this for the sick person is a sign of his approaching death. As for the person who sees a black snake in his dream, this means that someone envies him, is jealous of him, and seeks to get him into trouble. . Money and marriage to one young man are approaching. Seeing a snake in a person’s dream could be a sign of the presence of an enemy in his life and the problems that he suffers from. As for the man who sees in his dream that a snake attacks and bites him, this is a sign that he will suffer severe harm. As for the one who sees In a dream, a snake emerges from his stomach, this indicates that his relatives are causing him great harm, and if he sees a snake in his house, this means that he will be exposed to harm, and a man seeing a snake in his bed indicates that he is surrounded by an evil woman. As for seeing snake eggs in a dream, it indicates The worst enemies in the life of the dreamer and seeing a snake climbing indicates joy in the life of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq that seeing a snake in a dream expresses many dangers surrounding the dreamer, and it is a strong warning to him to take care. With all life issues. A black snake in a bachelor’s dream is an expression of a large number of bad thoughts, as well as the feeling of negative emotions. A dream in which a white snake is seen in a girl’s dream is an expression

title: Interpretation of a dream about going with the dead in a car by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about going with the dead person in the car. When the dreamer dreams of a dead person, the dreamer’s connection to the deceased person appears and this expresses how much he misses him. The dead are from their imagination, our only consolation is that we are all dead in the end and we will join those to whom our hearts are connected, and in this article we will tell you the interpretation of the dream of going with the dead in the car with all the details.Interpretation of the dream of going with the dead in the car by Ibn SirinDeath is one of the things common to all creatures that were created in This universe, because every beginning has an end, and so does our life, and that life is short, so we must make the most of our existence to do good. Actions to win heaven that no eye has seen or seen, and thus heard, and in the previous sentence the sky was described in an unparalleled way, and it was not clear what it would be like. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of going with the dead in the car to mean that the dreamer is going through a difficult period as a result of the loss of a loved one in The humiliation of the subconscious mind that makes the dreamer dream of this person. Because of his connection to him and the presence of many beautiful memories with the deceased, psychiatrists explained that when a person gets used to the lungs of this person, he always associates his mind with beautiful memories and others, and they also described it as addiction. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream of going with the dead in the car, which the dreamer cannot imagine and believes that this person has died. See also: Interpretation of the dream of the Kaaba in a dream for all interpreters. Interpretation of the dream of going with the dead in the car for the married woman. Death does not harm the dead, but rather harms the living. When does a person die? If there is someone who loves him and has a close relationship with him, he will remain sad for him even if days, months, and years have passed since his death. He will remain in his memory, and some people cannot complete their lives without him, so he should be patient with the separation and pray for the deceased. The scholars interpreted that if she saw The dreamer in her dream dreams of going with the dead in a car for a married woman, then this indicates that she feels very sad because of the death of her husband. The people of knowledge explained that if the dreamer dreams of going with the dead in a car for a married woman, then the dreamer is going through a difficult and difficult period, so she should not For those around her, he should leave her alone and be patient. The scholars explained that if the dreamer sees in her dream a dream of going with the dead person in the car for a married woman, this is evidence that the dreamer will bear responsibility for herself and her children after death. Face. See also: Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about going with the dead in the car for a pregnant woman. In this life, many people turn away from the idea of ​​death, and even strongly refuse to think about it, and this is a mistake because a person must face his fears and be able to prepare for what comes After death, this thing comforts a person because his end is known, and staying away from the bad deeds and evil that people expect from him. The scholars interpreted that if a woman sees in her dream that she is riding with the dead person in the car for the pregnant woman, this indicates that she feels extremely sad about the death of her fetus.

title: Interpretation of the car symbol in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Fahd Al-Usaimi driving a car in a dream and interpretation of a dream about repairing a car

preview.html: The symbol of a car in a dream: Is seeing a car good or bad? What are the negative meanings of a car in a dream? What does a dream about a black car mean? In the following lines, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a car for unmarried people, married people, pregnant women, and males, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi, and the leading interpretation scholars. The symbol of the car in a dream. Scientists interpreted the car in a dream as good news for the pioneer and evidence of the happiness that will come to him soon, and it was said that the red car indicates a promotion at work. Reaching the highest positions, and seeing a luxury car indicates that the dreamer’s wealth and economic level are high, and if the dreamer rides the car, this indicates that he will soon emigrate outside the country. If the dreamer sees an old car in his dream, this means that one of his secrets will soon be revealed, Therefore, he must be careful and careful. Driving a car in a dream is a sign of relief from anxiety and the end of problems and worries, and if the dreamer buys a car, this indicates a positive change that will soon occur in his life. The symbol of the car in Ibn Sirin’s dream. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a car as a sign that the dreamer is a constantly changing antenna and hates Routine. If the dreamer sells his car in his dream, this indicates his bad reputation and bad relationship with others, and the clean car in the vision symbolizes the dreamer’s purity and his good heart free from hatred and envy. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: Interpretation website Dreams on the InternetSearch on Google and get the correct interpretations. The symbol of the car in a dream Fahd Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi believes that the car in the vision shows that the dreamer is trying to make his life easier and is trying with all his effort to reach a specific goal that he aspires to, and driving a car in a dream is a sign of the dreamer. Strength and the ability to overcome the problems that he experiences during this period, while buying a car leads to improved financial conditions and the repayment of debts. The symbol of the car in a single woman’s dream. Seeing a car for an unmarried woman indicates that she is currently going through a great experience and will have to control her desire to overcome it, and if The dreamer saw someone driving a car while she was driving with him, it means being approved by that person achieving his goals and buying a car in a dream symbolizes earning money from work. If the dreamer is driving a car in her dream, it means that she will be promoted to a leadership position in her current job, and if The dreamer was looking at the car and did not want to drive it, which means that he does not want to get married now and is postponing this step until he is ready for that. The symbol of the car in a married woman’s dream. Scientists interpret the dream of a married car as a sign of the change that she will soon see in her life, and if the dreamer sees a car New in her dream, this indicates a certain decision that she will make soon and will not regret. Buying a car in a dream leads to a noticeable change in the financial level in the near future. If the dreamer sees that her husband is driving a car,

title: Interpretation of a dream about Al-Nabulsi, the letter Alif in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams by Al-Nabulsi: The letter Alif is the first letter of the alphabet and is one of the main letters in many words, and this is the first letter that children learn when they learn it. When the letter Alif appears in a dream, it means many different meanings and interpretations that differ from one vision to another, so we will expand on the interpretation of what we see about the letter Arif in our dreams. You may also be interested in: Penguin in a dream The dream interpretation of the Nabulsi letter Ali The dream interpretation of the Nabulsi letter A Ali Al-Nabulsi sees the character of Alif in a dream and it is believed that whoever was studying at that time will be the highest and first in his research this year. The word “A” in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate that you will marry a man whose name begins with this letter. Whoever sees the inscription Alif on his clothes will buy many Of new clothes in the coming days. You may also be interested in: Washing the dead according to Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing the letter A in a dream Ibn Sirin says that the word “alif” in a dream is one of the dreamer’s signs of morals and qualities. If the word “Arif” appears in a married woman’s dream, This is one of the characters that portends an abundance of food for her and her husband. If the dreamer is pregnant, then the word “alif” in the dream could be one of the signs of the birth of a male child who will please God. Arif’s message in an unmarried girl’s dream foretells that she will marry a good man. Interpretation of the letter alif in Nabulsi’s dream: Al-Nabulsi believes that the word “alif” in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s integrity in his work and public life. The number of alif in a married woman’s dream indicates a good state of understanding and affection between her and her husband. The word “Arif” in a married woman’s dream is one of the letters that announces that the dreamer He will be freed from the crises and difficulties he is going through at that time in his life. You may be interested: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of the letter Alif in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that the word “Alif” in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the birth of a child whose name begins with “Arif.” If the dreamer is committing sins and forbidden things, then the word “alif” in the dream indicates that he will repent before God Almighty and abandon all these forbidden things. When the word “alif” appears in the dream of an unmarried person, it is one of the letters that indicates the marriage of a good girl who is characterized by morals. Al-Hamidah. Interpretation of the letter A for a lion in a dream. According to the dream interpreter, if a lion appears in an unmarried girl’s dream, this indicates marriage to a man with a strong and sharp character. Seeing a lion in a man’s dream is a sign of overcoming and defeating the enemy. They also say that seeing a lion in a dream It means that the dreamer will assume the presidency in the coming days.
